text.section: The Department may establish a consolidated publications account.
The Department may place in the account excess revenues that remain at the end of the fiscal year that are derived from publications of the Department or its units.
The Department may only use the account to produce, distribute, and promote publications, including free publications, of the Department and its units.

section.section:
Any unexpended money in the account at the end of a fiscal year not exceeding $40,000:
does not revert to the General Fund of the State; but
shall be maintained as a special fund.
Any unexpended money in the account at the end of a fiscal year exceeding $40,000 reverts to the General Fund under § 7-302 of the State Finance and Procurement Article.
